items.title: De bijzondere WK-droom van Heracles-spits Kulenovic
items.summary: Er zitten veel haken en ogen aan, maar Luka Kulenovic droomt van deelname aan het WK van komende zomer. Daarvoor moet er nog veel gebeuren, want Bosni√´ en Herzegovina moet zich nog plaatsen en de spits van Heracles Almelo zit vooralsnog niet bij de selectie. Kulenovic legt uit waarom het komende WK speciaal is voor hem.

items.title: Delay in disallowed Semenyo goal an 'edge case'
items.summary: The delay in ruling out a Manchester City goal for offside in Tuesday's Carabao Cup win at Newcastle was extended because semi-automated offside technology could not be used in the incident.

items.title: Man City sign USWNT's Coffey from Thorns

items.title: Monaco CEO on injured Pogba: Plan isn't working
items.summary: Monaco's CEO acknowledged that their original plan for Paul Pogba "is not working," with the former France star limited to just 30 minutes of action since joining the club last summer.

items.title: VI Live: Salah strijdt tegen Man√© om finaleplek Afrika Cup
items.summary: Smullen op de woensdagavond. In de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker staan AZ en Ajax tegenover elkaar. Maar eerst komt PSV - op bezoek bij FC Den Bosch - in actie. In het buitenland staan onder meer Chelsea - Arsenal, FC Porto - Benfica en wedstrijden van Real Madrid, Bayern M√ºnchen, Napoli en Internazionale op het programma. Ook de halve finales van de Afrika Cup worden vanavond afgewerkt.

items.title: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside?
items.summary: Is the offside law about to change to Arsene Wenger's daylight idea? And should football make that change just because of VAR?

items.title: Opstelling PSV: Bajraktarevic start als spits in Den Bosch
items.summary: Esmir Bajraktarevic start woensdagavond als spits bij PSV. Op bezoek bij FC Den Bosch grijpt trainer Peter Bosz uit nood de kans aan om iets nieuws te proberen in de invulling van zijn aanvalslinie. Inzet: de kwartfinale in de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker.

items.title: Tottenham sign Conor Gallagher for ¬£34.7m as Frank says he will bring ‚Äòleadership‚Äô

The 25-year-old has joined Spurs from Atl√©tico Madrid in a deal worth in the region of ‚Ç¨40m (¬£34.7m) and is understood to have signed a contract until the summer of 2031. Aston Villa had initially led the race for Gallagher, who is keen for more playing time ahead of this summer‚Äôs World Cup, but Tottenham were able to convince the former Chelsea academy graduate to return to London. items.title: Klaverboer terug onder Friese lat na badkamerincident
items.summary: Bernt Klaverboer neemt donderdag weer plaats onder de lat bij SC Heerenveen. De jonge sluitpost (20) ontbrak afgelopen weekend tegen Feyenoord (2-2) door een incident in de badkamer .

items.title: Football Daily | Alonso and the trouble with replacing ego and vibes with work ethic at Madrid
items.summary: Sign up now! Sign up now! Sign up now? Sign up now! Having started this season at Real Madrid with 13 wins from his first 14 games, Xabi Alonso could be forgiven for thinking he was on to a good thing in his new role of Kindergarten Cop, tasked with instilling discipline among the spoilt and unruly brats in his care. While this excellent run was punctuated by a tonking at the hands of Atl√©tico and a diva strop thrown by Vin√≠cius J√∫nior, Alonso seemed to have pulled off the unthinkable by introducing something approaching a work ethic into a group of players who had previously been powered on ego and vibes. It wasn‚Äôt until November that the passengers on board the Madrid wagon began to unscrew the wheels, when a series of poor results led to revelations that all was not well in the camp. Leaks suggested the squad was split between the few players who were entirely sold on the 43-year-old‚Äôs ethos and the apparent vast majority who took exception to this Jos√© Come-Lately‚Äôs tyrannical demands that they turn up on time, run around a bit and occasionally sit through boring tactical presentations that lasted longer than a FaceSpace Snap. The suggestion that Manchester United hve taken/should take advice from Seinfeld [yesterday‚Äôs Football Daily] got me thinking. There was an episode about a competition during which, um, refraining from certain personal activities led to a temporary increase in intelligence (note: for male participants only!). As I recall, one of the outcomes was that George Costanza became fluent in Portuguese. Does this explain why the United board hired Messrs Mourinho and Amorim and signed Cristiano Ronaldo in recent years? And, does the hiring of Mr Carrick signal the, um, the end of the competition?‚Äù ‚Äì Mike Wilner. Following Dan Westacott‚Äôs letter about JR (yesterday‚Äôs letters), surely a growing number of Manchester United‚Äôs fans are praying that they will wake up back in 2013, where Sir Alex Ferguson will be getting out of the shower one morning, preparing himself for a press conference when he will announce that he isn‚Äôt actually retiring‚Äù ‚Äì Simon Dunsby. Not only did Dan get a letter published with a joke from 40 years ago, but he won letter of the day! And you didn‚Äôt even have to look it up! Oh, wait ‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì Z Snook. Seriously guys? Only two options and you gave letter of the day to the writer not called Gumley Slats!?!‚Äù ‚Äì Adam Sherlock. This is an extract from our daily football email ‚Ä¶ Football Daily. To get the full version, just visit this page and follow the instructions. Continue reading...

items.title: Spurs & Villa charged over melee after FA Cup game
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur and Aston Villa are charged with misconduct by the Football Association following a melee at the conclusion of Saturday's FA Cup game.

items.title: ‚ÄòOne of the world‚Äôs best‚Äô: Manchester City swoop for USWNT midfielder Sam Coffey
items.summary: USA mainstay in move from Portland Thorns ‚ÄòI couldn‚Äôt be more ready and happy about everything‚Äô Manchester City have signed the USA midfielder Sam Coffey on a three-and-a-half year deal. The 27-year-old won gold at the Paris 2024 Olympics and has accrued 42 caps and scored five goals for the USA, becoming a key part of Emma Hayes‚Äô national team. After graduating she joined Portland Thorns and lifted the 2022 NWSL Championship in her debut season. Continue reading...

items.title: Premier League's top 50 transfers of all time: Who is No. 1?
items.summary: What makes a great signing? Is it trophies won, goals scored, a long run of dominance ... or all of the above? Bill Connelly breaks down the best 50 Premier League moves since it began in 1992-93.

items.title: Spurs sporting director Paratici to join Fiorentina
items.summary: Tottenham's joint sporting director Fabio Paratici is to leave the club and join Fiorentina following the end of the January transfer window, three months after returning to the club.
